title: TFW Fighting One of Your Mains
body:
And know exactly how to destroy your opponet

https://media3.giphy.com/media/MRHe3g14nLR1S/giphy.gif

We do what must be done... For the sake of our elo...

replies.body:
{{champion:83}}: "..."

{{champion:78}}: "..."

{{champion:83}}: "..."

{{champion:78}}: "..."

{{champion:83}}: "So you're the one that stole my main and went support without even getting a legitimate build."
Gotta love those people
I definitely love gutting them in game.
Then feeding their bodies to the Baron
seeing other people play veigar and build tear is so fucking painful to watch

> [{quoted}](name=great caretaker,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bZBEFEiw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-17T18:01:08.330+0000)
>
> seeing other people play veigar and build tear is so fucking painful to watch

I saw a veigar build a bloodthirster in one of my brothers games today.
http://67.media.tumblr.com/6637ce323c7b56a8c288592055e761b9/tumblr_mk4gfwcwTl1re04pso1_500.jpg
I love these League text posts so much
Is op
Even worse when they start W...

They took my main?

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/60949008.jpg

Basically you have to kill yourself

** (note not telling anyone to kill thenselves, this is not meant to be a threat or any other bad thing)**

In order to maintain your rank... Even with old mains it sometimes feels bad man

They make it easier by using skins.

I've waited so long for a decent Syndra skin, I'm unable to get any of them, even if I actually liked one, so it's like I'm fighting a completely different champion.
Well in that case, they're a fraud... Easy kills
Easy lane, easy game.
Maybe he'll monkey around and feed
When people take sona from me and i see they have thunderlords, i know its going to be an easy game.

I know the ideal masteries for her, but wouldn't thunderlords be really deadly on her?

Just curious

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bZBEFEiw,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-17T17:51:04.751+0000)
>
> I know the ideal masteries for her, but wouldn't thunderlords be really deadly on her?
> 
> Just curious

It makes her early game poke stronger, but her heals will be low in comparison. Also most sona players who take thunderlords tend to build squishy AP so they can do damage, but will get one shot by a lulu with -100 ap.
So I guess you main {{champion:37}} and play her support? That's a low use of her potential

> [{quoted}](name=DireXcon,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bZBEFEiw,comment-id=0003000000000001,timestamp=2016-10-17T20:50:46.234+0000)
>
> So I guess you main {{champion:37}} and play her support? That's a low use of her potential

not if you know how to play her. Attack speed boost for your whole team with additional magic damage. Censer + grail and you can heal upwards of 800 hp in a single W and to top it off, you still do loads of damage.

1) i personally think {{item:3504}} 's 15% as + 30 on-hit magic dmg is close to useless in late game unless ur team consists of {{champion:245}} top, {{champion:5}} jg, {{champion:10}} mid. I wouldnt get it on sona in any phase of the game if my adc is the only one that benefits from the aa steroid

2) {{item:3174}} passive is only useful if u do enough damage to get enough blood charge to be effective. And i wouldnt call {{item:3504}} + {{item:3174}} = enough damage

3) or perhaps it's just all about personal preference

At the end of a ranked game. 
It's all about getting your ELO
No matter the cost... It's disgusting...

Its to bad I don't play Irelia, Fiora, or Olaf(oh god not Olaf).

Kudos if you know what my main is without looking it up.
Riven?
Half Kudos, I rank fived her out of curiosity half a year ago. Try again(you were close!)

Yasuo? 
I hope it's not some off meta top laner like Rengar... Cause that feels too obvious XD

No Kudos, I wouldn't dare.

Hint: My main is a Male character(definitively).
Second Hint: Olaf is not on the champion counters lists online for him, despite being his biggest counter.

No idea then...
Umm Swain?
I think Swain would have a tough time against Olaf

1/4 Kudos, I did play him... in season 4.

Hint: Hes an AD champion
Second HInt: he does have ONE AP scaling ability.

Nope. no idea now.

Maybe Trundle?

:P No sorry, here the big hint.

BIG HINT: This champion in no way is considered tanky, but rather all-around assassin/marksman
SECOND BIG HINT: Only has three skins(soon four! HYPE!)
Jayce? He's getting fourth skin.
http://img14.deviantart.net/556f/i/2014/019/e/e/mr__jayce_gatsby_by_fiveonthe-d72rg34.jpg

Wow... Who wouldn't have sex with that.
*saves picture*

_enemy picks _{{champion:11}} _I pick_{{champion:23}} : fuck you yi
{{champion:54}}{{item:3110}}

https://media.tenor.co/images/2e6565fd3a6d1055dc1dacffca22360d/raw

({{champion:14}}  main here)
RIP Enemy Lissandra, you will not be missed.
Seeing other people play Kayle and building a rabbadons/lich bane moves me to tears.
Do explain more, as I suck dearly with Kayle

Kayle is an attack speed mage. Gone are the days where you one-shot people with a Q. Her E is everything and i often find myself maxing Q last as her shield is actually really strong too.

My typical build path is Nashors Tooth (absolute staple), Berzerkers Greaves, Guinsoo's Rageblade (one of the few champions that still put this item to good use. It's insane on Kayle and is a pretty big power spike), Wits End (even on AD heavy teams. The on-hit bonus combined with the Rageblade is just ridiculous), Rylai's Crystal Scepter and then either a Voidstaff to just rip the enemy in half or a Hurricane if you cant easily get to the squishies or a Guardian Angel.
Do you being Atck Sp in your runes? I can buy lucidity boots if I go Bloodrazer.

AS Reds, Scaling armor yellows, Scaling cooldown blues, then 2 AP quints and 1 flat CDR quint. You don't need to buy lucidity boots on kayle if you have those runes, as you'll have 100% uptime on your E mid-to-late game and decent uptime early. Always go Berzerkers greaves as it gives you much needed AS going into the mid game, before you get the Guinsoos.
Thank you so much!
Thank you
